text: (malāyikāvarun men) kavurun niyata vaśayenma obagē deviyan veta siṭinnōda, ovun ohuva næmadīmehi degiḍiyāvak dakvannē næta. ehet (‘oba itāmat pariśuddhavantayeki, oba itāmat pariśuddhavantayeki’ yayi) ohuva (sǣmaviṭama) suviśuddha karaminda, ohuṭa hisa navā sujūd karamin (namadimin)da siṭinnāha
